app.title: The Good, The Bad and The Accountant
app.description: Can you run a city without falling prey to the sirens of corruption? Test yourself by playing The Good, The Bad and The Accountant!

tweet.text: How long can you survive in a corrupt city hall? Take your chance!

intro.heading:
The Good, The Bad
and The Accountant
intro.description:
You're the general manager of a large city. Balance ethics and corruption to keep your position and get things done. Whatever happens, don't get caught!

Every example in the game is based on real cases.

over.share: You embezzled {{amount}} in {{years}} years. Challenge your friends to make more!

toolbar.heading:
The Good, The Bad
and The Accountant

hints.description: Hints are collected during the game.
